definition: A term commonly employed to refer to items that are consumed by individuals to sustain their nutrition and satisfy their hunger. It encompasses a wide range of products, including both fresh and processed food items, beverages, and other consumables. This word is frequently used in the context of grocery shopping, meal planning, and discussions related to nutrition and dietary habits.

examples.german: Lebensmittel sind Nahrungsmittel, die zum Verzehr geeignet sind.
examples.english: Food is any substance consumed to provide nutritional support for an organism.

examples.german: Der Supermarkt hat eine große Auswahl an Lebensmitteln.
examples.english: The supermarket has a wide range of food products.

examples.german: Lebensmittel sollten immer hygienisch gelagert werden.
examples.english: Food should always be stored hygienically.

examples.german: Die Qualität der Lebensmittel ist sehr wichtig für die Gesundheit.
examples.english: The quality of food is very important for health.

examples.german: Lebensmittelverschwendung ist ein großes Problem in vielen Ländern.
examples.english: Food waste is a major problem in many countries.
